title: Is there a song written about Marseille, France? - Quora

response.answer_text: Coast Of Marseilles · Jimmy Buffett  The Angels - Marseilles  Songs in French: Patrick Fiori - Marseille  some oldies: Barbara-Tais-toi Marseille  Fernandel - Tout ça c’est Marseille  Marseille mes amours - Mireille Ponsard  Rap/hip hop Akhenaton (from the legendary band IAM) - Bad Boys de Marseille  also: - IAM - Planète Mars, Marseille contre-attaque ,Marseille la nuit -Fonky Family ft. 3e œil – Marseille envahit -Keny Arkana - Capitale de la rupture -Bouga - Belsunce Breakdown Reggae Massilia Sound System - Dimanche aux goudes

Yes there is,check out Marseille by the Australian band called The Angels.Sadly they are no longer together as the lead singer ‘Doc' Neeson passed away.They were one of Australia's biggest bands and also nice guys to chat to as I met them quite a bit when they played here in Perth/Western Australia.I first saw them in 1978 when they supported David Bowie when he first toured here then.
A nice old song: Marseille, tais-toi Marseille. You can hear it on Youtube sung by several French artists like Colette Renard, Barbara, etc.
